user_profile.goals: maximum returns, aggressive growth, only stocks

stocks_selected.name: Bharat Electronics Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Defence electronics player with strong order book and consistent profitability. Huge 1-year return and sector leadership.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Expected to benefit from increased defence spending and steady export growth. Technical momentum remains high.

stocks_selected.name: Laurus Labs Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Leader in pharma CRAMS with outstanding revenue growth and high momentum. Excellent niche in custom synthesis.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Strong performance expected as global pharma outsourcing grows; catalyst-rich pipeline supports outperformance.

stocks_selected.name: Multi Commodity Exchange of India Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Strong monopoly in commodities exchange, benefits from rising commodity trading volumes. Healthy margins and minimal debt.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Increasing derivative volumes and platform upgrades should sustain high growth over coming years.

stocks_selected.name: Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: India’s premier defense shipyard, benefiting from naval orders and 'Make in India' initiatives. Zero debt and robust margins.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Large pipeline of indigenous defence contracts ensures visibility for multi-year growth.

stocks_selected.name: Datamatics Global Services Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Fast-growing IT automation player, strong digital transformation demand. High recent returns and decent value metrics.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Digital services sector tailwind likely to continue as India and global clients increase spending.

stocks_selected.name: Laurus Labs Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Repeated due to high allocation and momentum, emphasizing concentration for aggressive growth.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Continued sector leadership in upcoming pharma cycle.

stocks_selected.name: Redington Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Strong supply chain IT distributor with high momentum and recurring business. Consistent multi-year outperformance.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Growth in cloud adoption and device distribution should support double-digit gains.

stocks_selected.name: Hitachi Energy India Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Leader in digital grids and energy solutions, benefits from India's green infrastructure expansion. Exceptional stock momentum.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Continued infrastructure push and electrification to drive future returns.

stocks_selected.name: Jindal Saw Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Steel pipes supplier with low PE, good dividend, and strong sector headwinds. Value opportunity in cyclical upturn expected.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Re-rating possible as infrastructure and oil pipeline demand picks up.

stocks_selected.name: JK Tyre & Industries Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Tyre manufacturer benefiting from automotive rebound. Strong momentum and reasonable valuation versus peers.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Expansion in electric vehicle segment expected to be growth catalyst.

what_if_analysis.conservative_return: Assuming a volatile market with 8% annualized return, your investment could grow to ~146,933 INR after 5 years.
what_if_analysis.moderate_return: At a 12% CAGR, portfolio grows to ~176,234 INR in 5 years.
what_if_analysis.optimistic_return: If your picks perform exceptionally and deliver 18% CAGR, portfolio reaches ~227,908 INR after 5 years.

summary: This is a pure high-risk, high-reward stock portfolio focused on 5 sectors: Industrials, Healthcare, Technology, Basic Materials, and Consumer Cyclical. Each stock has been chosen for its momentum, growth, and ability to outperform in an expanding economy. Diversification still applies—spread across 5+ sectors to avoid single industry risk, but tilt towards growth leaders.

risk_analysis.mild_crash: If the market drops by 10% in one year, you could lose ~10,000 INR. Expected recovery in 1-2 years for high-momentum sectors.
risk_analysis.moderate_crash: In a 20% market drop, portfolio could go down by ~20,000 INR. Some sectors like technology may recover faster, others slower.
risk_analysis.severe_crash: During a 30% correction, potential loss of ~30,000 INR. Aggressive portfolios require patience—bear markets may last up to 3 years.
risk_analysis.summary: High risk brings high volatility. Expect sharp swings but recovery is likely over a 5-year window, especially in growth sectors. Always monitor and rebalance yearly.

education_tips.diversification_importance: Even in aggressive portfolios, sector diversification prevents any one shock from wiping out your gains.
education_tips.long_term_perspective: Staying invested through market cycles is crucial; avoid emotional selling during panic.
education_tips.rebalancing_strategy: Review your holdings annually—sell laggards, increase winners, and maintain sector balance.
education_tips.understanding_risk: High-growth stocks can drop 40%+ during crashes; invest only what you can afford to leave untouched for 5 years.
